Group.title: iCloud configuration
Group.description: Policies regarding the usage of “cloud” storage services continue to evolve, as do the assurances of safety by cloud providers. In general, if there is a need to store potentially sensitive information on the iOS device, then the following restrictions are recommended.

Rule.title: Disable iCloud Document Sync
Rule.description: Set Allow document sync to Unchecked.

Rule.title: Disable iCloud Photo Stream
Rule.description: Set Allow Photo Stream to Unchecked.
